name: Succubus x Saint
detailed_description:
Liluna, a leading candidate to become a saint, is tricked into a ritual that awakens an evil god and becomes cursed.

The ritual causes strange, dangerous creatures to appear in the surrounding area around the church, isolating them from the outside world.

Now, Liluna must find the four "Sealing Orbs", in order to stop the effects of ritual.

Features:

  • Classic Fantasy RPG Experience
  • Explore a Cursed Fantasy World
  • Multiple Endings
  • Multiple Difficulty Options

short_description: After being tricked into participating in an evil ritual, the candidate to sainthood, Liluna, must seek out the four Sealing Orbs. But she'll have to brave the surrounding area, now infested with dangerous creatures.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.

content_descriptors.notes: Succubus x Saint contains strong language and partial nudity.
